sub_title: Workcoach by daylight - Cultural Anthropologist by moonlight
summary:
ENGLISH BELOW

“Grote dingen gebeuren niet alleen door een impuls, maar als een opeenvolging van kleine dingen die met elkaar verbonden zijn.” (van Gogh)

Ik geloof in de alledaagse kleine acties die voor de grootste impact kunnen zorgen. Dit kan een gesprek zijn met een vreemde in het park. Dit kan een autorit van een uur zijn met een persoon die je pas net hebt ontmoet. Het is een rimpel effect dat klein begint maar daarna zich alleen zal verspreiden als je het laat zijn. 

Als project manager verzorg ik de dagelijkse operaties zodat een mooi resultaat geleverd wordt. Ik ga door bij tegenslagen en vraag altijd “Hoe kan dit anders?”. Ik combineer een goede dosis van analytisch denken en het onderscheid maken tussen het essentiële en niet-essentiële. Verder neem ik altijd mijn enthousiasme en humor mee naar werk. 

Project management | Communicatief | Verbindend  | Creatief | Leergierig

---

"Great thing are done by a series of small things brought together" (van Gogh) 

I believe that it is small mundane actions that can generate the biggest impact. This can be a conversation with a stranger in the park. This can be a one hour car drive with a person you just met. It is a ripple effect that starts very small but can only expand if you let it be. 

As a project manager I take care of the daily operations to create a great result. When facing challenges I ask myself the question “How can I do this differently?” I combine a good dose of analytical thinking and discerning between the essential and non-essential. Further, I always make sure I bring in enthusiasm and humor to work.

Project management | Communicative | Connecting | Creative | Studious

treasury_media.title: Op de set met: Mata Hari Media
treasury_media.description: Om zes uur ‘s ochtends werd de crew verwacht voor het ontbijt. Een Indonesisch buffet met rijst, tempeh, kip en mungbonensoep stond warm. De koude wind van Valkenburg schudde de Nederlandse en Indonesische crew wakker. Het is bijna tijd voor de first...

treasury_media.title: Waar Oost en West elkaar ontmoeten
treasury_media.description: Tussen 5 en 10 maart werd de twaalfde editie van CinemAsia Film Festival gehouden in Amsterdam. “CinemAsia verzamelt, deelt en ontwikkelt Aziatische verhalen om de Aziatische zichtbaarheid in de samenleving te versterken”, luidt hun missie statement....

treasury_media.title: Vroeger was alles mogelijk
treasury_media.description: Begin deze maand stond de VERS Avond in het teken van Nederlandse jeugdtelevisie uit de jaren ‘90. Veel twintigers en dertigers kwamen naar deze uitverkochte editie om samen met de cast van  Roos en haar mannen  terug te blikken op deze populaire serie.

treasury_media.title: De heetste VERS Avond in de geschiedenis
treasury_media.description: Ondanks een koud begin van 2019 begon de eerste VERS Avond van dit jaar met de heetste avond ooit. Deze stond namelijk in het teken van naakt in Nederlandse film. Hoe bereidt een acteur zich voor op een naaktscène en wat is de belevingswereld van...

projects.title: Twee sokken maken een paar
projects.description: Twee sokken maken een paar is a script in progress which was created during Cinemasia's FilmLAB program. For this project I had to make a script which considers a bi-cultural relationship and focuses on the female perspective. My script follows the story of a young Dutch-Indonesian bisexual woman who is about to marry with a Thai transman who experience the last stress during their wedding day when a cake is delivered with two brides on top. I chose this topic because it is close to my heart and I feel that the story is approachable and relatable with many people.

contributors.headline: Workcoach by daylight - Cultural Anthropologist by moonlight

projects.title: Strawberry Fields
projects.description:
As part of the Cineimpact Summer Film School in Câmpulung Romania, this film was created together with two team members. 

Synopsis: 
Set in a small town in the foothill of the Carpatian mountains, Strawberry Fields tells a story of Romanian single-mom, Lenuța. The cross she carries is heavy, but she pays great attention to the smallest details and corners of her town. She cares for beings and things, even the things others are trying to get rid of. Her daily life sets to another course which brings her to the crossroads between leaving and returning home to her son Alex.

contributors.headline: Workcoach by daylight - Cultural Anthropologist by moonlight

projects.title: Unicorn Cat
projects.description: Unicorn Cat is a 10 minute film, created as part of the Cinemasia FilmLAB program. For this project I took the role of line-producer where I supported my team in order to create the best film. It follows the life of a young girl, daughter of Indian expats, who live in Amstelveen.

contributors.headline: Workcoach by daylight - Cultural Anthropologist by moonlight

projects.title: Fight like a girl
projects.description: What started out as a reaction towards the current film of Indonesian martial arts, became a project that shows a reflection of realities in the minds of several female martial artists of Jakarta. I was frustrated with the lack of female martial artists in Indonesian silat film, whereas the male characters were selected on their silat skill. Hence, I decided for my MSc project to create a film with female martial artists in Jakarta and discover how they would create a narrative, that (might) differ from major production houses. Bits and parts of the whole ethnofiction progress can be found on the website.

contributors.headline: Workcoach by daylight - Cultural Anthropologist by moonlight

projects.title: Select Gender
projects.description:
This film was created during my pre-master of Cultural Anthropology and Development Sociology. As a fan of the Japanese anime-culture and because of my interest in Gender Studies, it was interesting to do a research on a woman who considers herself as 'gender fluid'. 

Synopsis: The film follows a young woman, named Lotte, who expresses herself in daily life as gender fluid or gender neutral. Moving between reality and fantasy, Lotte expresses her love for her characters in cosplay, whether they are expressively male or female. What are then the boundaries regarding gender, if one does not desire to create one?

contributors.headline: Workcoach by daylight - Cultural Anthropologist by moonlight

profile_positions.title: Interactive Producer & Editor

profile_positions.description:
Cinemasia FilmLAB is a program which offers Dutch- and European-Asian filmmakers a platform to further develop their skills. This year had two programs, namely creating a documentary and creating a script. For this year's FilmLAB I had decided to follow both programs because I am interesting in making docufictions later on in my career. 

Cinemasia FilmLAB Documentary track:
For this program I participated as producer where I had to do the practical work in order for my team to make the documentary. My tasks consider communication within and outside the team, make a planning and all-round help. The documentary (10 min) we created is called 'Unicorn Cat' which follows the life of a young girl, a daughter of Indian expats, who lives in Amstelveen. 

Cinemasia FilmLAB Script track:
For this project I had to make a script which considers a bi-cultural relationship and focuses on the female perspective. My script follows the story of a young Dutch-Indonesian bisexual woman who is about to marry with a Thai transman who experience the last stress during their wedding day when a cake is delivered with two brides on top. I chose this topic because it is close to my heart and I feel that the story is approachable and relatable with many people.
profile_positions.title: FilmLAB Participant

profile_positions.description: Aside from my studies I started working part-time at the airport to stay connected with an international environment. As service employer it was my task to ensure our international guests had a delightful time at our restaurant before boarding their planes to other destinations.
profile_positions.title: Employee

profile_positions.description:
Personal successes within organization:
- Organizing the speaking competition together with the Indonesian Embassy in The Hague
- Organizing the Pub Quiz together with the Ministry of Foreign affairs
- Organizing seasonal social drinks

Volunteering as the vice-chairperson of the Indonesia Nederland Youth Society has opened many doors for me. As an all-round volunteer I helped out with all sorts of task. It may be coming up with new ideas, helping my team members finishing up their tasks or continuing certain events that holds INYS signature such as the Speaking Competition held at the Indonesian Embassy in The Hague. What I loved the most was helping out the Dutch and Indonesian to stay connected with the Netherlands and Indonesia.
profile_positions.title: Vice Chairperson

volunteer_experiences.description:
Via theater en storytelling bespreekt stichting LYS onderwerpen die soms uit ongemak weggemoffeld worden. Dit wordt op een lichte en toegankelijke manier bespreekbaar gemaakt om zo de leefwereld van mensen positief te veranderen. Ik speel in de voorstelling Kleurles dat vertelt over racisme en discriminatie.

--

Through theatre and storytelling the foundation LYS discusses themes that are often uncomfortable for people to talk about. These themes are made accessible and shown in  a lighthearted manner to change the living experiences of people in a positive way. I play in the story Kleurles (Colour Lesson) which talks about racism and discrimination.

company.name: Vereniging VERS / nieuwe film- en televisiemakers

volunteer_experiences.description: As volunteer with VERS magazine I will write articles about film in the Netherlands. This also includes interviews with professionals from the film and television industry. I hope to write more stories that also include issues of diversity, gender and representation within the Dutch film and television industry.

During my exchange in Yogyakarta, Indonesia, for a brief moment I volunteered at Project Child. The goal of Project Child is to provide additional education to children who live in the slums of Yogyakarta. My tasks mostly consisted of supporting the teachers and helping the children with their studies during the sessions.
